cookieModal.description: Here at Nothing Notes we only use strictly necessary cookies in your note-taking app.
cookieModal.title: Cookie Preferences
cookieModal.moreInfo: This website uses a single cookie to store your login session. The information stored in this cookie (your access token) is securely encrypted and only used to identify you during your session. It is not used for any other purposes.
